publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-153# Donald Gorrie: Football Clubs—That the Parliament notes the financial difficulties faced by some clubs in the Scottish Football Leagues and supports the clubs having a greater role in youth and community development.

S1M-153# Donald Gorrie: Football Clubs—That the Parliament notes the financial difficulties faced by some clubs in the Scottish Football Leagues and supports the clubs having a greater role in youth and community development.
S1M-153# Football Clubs (lodged on 15 September 1999) Mrs Margaret Smith*

S1M-153# Donald Gorrie: Football Clubs—That the Parliament notes the financial difficulties faced by some clubs in the Scottish Football Leagues and supports the clubs having a greater role in youth and community development. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Smith
